title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\V2\RowFilter\Chain
name: Chain
description:
A RowFilter which sends rows through several RowFilters in sequence.

Generated from protobuf message google.bigtable.v2.RowFilter.Chain

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.filters
params.description: The elements of "filters" are chained together to process the input row: in row -> f(0) -> intermediate row -> f(1) -> ... -> f(N) -> out row The full chain is executed atomically.

methods.name: getFilters
methods.description:
